search: Are there any bridges you are thinking of?
note:
Has it ever happened to you that while watching a movie you spotted a bridge in the background and started wondering where that place is?
This site is here to help!
bridgeDescription: Opened in {{ year }}, {{ name }} is located in {{ city }} ({{ country }}).
noBridges: Sorry, but there are no bridges added to this country yet...

content.b: If you would like to contribute and be a part of the "Oh, that bridge!" family, feel free to send us a simple email.
content.c: If the bridge is not yet in our database, please provide:
content.d: Please make sure you are the owner of the pictures or the license allows for a free usage.
content.e: Once you have all the data, feel free to mail us at:

data.e: Your data (links, nickname, etc.), so we can also display it :)
data.f: Any other data you think would be useful
